#include <iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include <vector>
#include <sstream>
#include <iomanip>
using namespace std;

int main(int argc, char** argv) {

////////// DO NOT EDIT! //////////
  string path = argv[1];        //
//////////////////////////////////  

  ifstream file(path);
  if (!file.is_open()) {
      cerr << "Error opening file!" << endl;
      return 1;
  }

  vector<vector<int>> data;
  string line;

  // Read each line
  while (getline(file, line)) {
      stringstream ss(line);
      string value;
      vector<int> row;
      
      // Split line by comma
      while (getline(ss, value, ',')) {
          row.push_back(stoi(value));
      }
      data.push_back(row);
  }

  file.close();

  // Calculate averages of each column
  int rows = data.size();
  int cols = data[0].size();
  
  for (int c = 0; c < cols; ++c) {
      int sum = 0;
      for (int r = 0; r < rows; ++r) {
          sum += data[r][c];
      }
      cout << sum / rows << " ";
  }
  cout << endl;
  
  return 0;
}
